item.title: First Sample
item.description: Hugging face demo Pipeline for a chatbot based on my logs get the log files colab test Hugging face space Visit https://huggingface.co/new-space and fill in the form. LangChain Bug log Chatbot: LangChain -> generates prompt and process -> LLM -> Generates response. In principle, for blogs and these short contests, it is sufficient to directly generate a prompt+query using LLM. Using LangChain system that is still being developed, is overly complicated.
